channel.title: How to make Bank spot to safe zone in a pvp server?
channel.description: ok, pvp world in 317 is not my best. pleasecould someon explain :) it would be nice of you.

item.title: How to make Bank spot to safe zone in a pvp server?
item.dc:creator: @attk_mast3r attk mast3r
item.description:
@attk_mast3r wrote:

what i did is tried to find something in my client.java and what i found was this:

|| absX >= #### && absX <= #### && absY >= #### && absY <= #### //location
^ ^ ^ ^
lowest x coordinate highest x coordinate lowest y coordinate highest y coordinate

try searching for || absX >=

then recreate that under the last one and insert the values of the area you want to make non wildy.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make Bank spot to safe zone in a pvp server?

add this line
